article_text: Under an agreement that takes effect Feb. 1, Sutter Medical Foundation said Tuesday it will take control of RAS’ radiation oncology and diagnostic imaging services. Nearly 800 RAS employees, including the 60 doctors who own the radiology business, will go to work for the Sutter affiliate, Sutter Medical Group. The RAS name will give way to the Sutter brand.

article_metadata.title: Sutter buys Radiological Associates | The Sacramento Bee

article_summary:
Nearly 800 RAS employees, including the 60 doctors who own the radiology business, will go to work for the Sutter affiliate, Sutter Medical Group.
Under an agreement that takes effect Feb. 1, Sutter Medical Foundation said Tuesday it will take control of RAS’ radiation oncology and diagnostic imaging services.
The RAS name will give way to the Sutter brand.
